definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort
tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: The new woman secretary was extremely clever and capable.
sentences.chinese: 这位新来的女书记很是精明强干。

sentences.english: The winds and waves are always on the side of the ablest navigators.
sentences.chinese: 狂风和巨浪永远站在最精明强干的航海家一边。

sentences.english: Our monitor is a very smart boy. We all believe in him.
sentences.chinese: 我们的班长精明强干，我们都很信任他。

sentences.english: The winds and waves are always on the side of the ablest navigators .
sentences.chinese: 狂风和巨浪永远站在最精明强干的航海家一边。

definition: be smooth and slick (in establishing social relations)
rigorous schemes and deep foresight (idiom); astute and circumspect
experienced in the ways of the world (idiom); worldly-wise/sophisticated
long sleeves help one dance beautifully (idiom); money and power will help you in any occupation
lit. deep plans and distant thoughts/to plan far ahead (idiom)
subtle way of thinking (idiom); hard to fathom/deep and shrewd
to stop at nothing (idiom)/to dare to do anything
